search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for BugHerd (bugherd.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The URL to the official pricing page for BugHerd is: [https://www.bugherd.com/pricing](https://www.bugherd.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: BugHerd Pricing - Flexible Plans for Seamless Website Feedback Management

extracted_content.content:
Simple, straightforward plans for every team.
---------------------------------------------

**Whether you're a freelancer, a boutique agency or a large team, we have a plan for you.**    
All BugHerd plans include unlimited feedback, powerful integrations, and a customizable project board to streamline your workflow. Upgrade for more users, enhanced security, and dedicated support to ensure project success.

**Monthly**

**Yearly** **(2 months free!)**

![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f348cefc28f736422d5b00d/66cd588c8fb71f885606e0bc_ic-plan-01%20standard-outline.svg)

##### Standard

$49

$49

**/ mo**

##### Members:

##### 5

**Ideal for freelancers and small teams.**

*   Unlimited Client users
*   Unlimited Projects
*   Feedback on websites, Figma designs, PDFs, images
*   Capture screenshots & technical metadata
*   Video feedback
*   Standard integrations (Trello, Slack, GitHub + 12 more)

##### POPULAR 🔥

![Image 2: red pin icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f348cefc28f73bfbed5b00a/666fdaeb587fa0982ec0a678_pattern-pin-red.svg)

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f348cefc28f736422d5b00d/66cd589dc3cc86196a210904_ic-plan-02%20studio-outline.svg)

##### Studio

$79

$79

**/ mo**

##### Members:

##### 10

**Perfect for growing agencies needing to manage multiple projects and clients effectively.**

Everything in **Standard**, plus:

*   More Members
*   More storage

##### POPULAR 🔥

![Image 4: red pin icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f348cefc28f73bfbed5b00a/666fdaeb587fa0982ec0a678_pattern-pin-red.svg)

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f348cefc28f736422d5b00d/66cd58aa15067c3c944f5374_ic-plan-03%20premium-outline.svg)

##### Premium

$149

$149

**/ mo**

##### Members:

##### 25

**Tailored for agencies and larger teams who want to deliver an exceptional project experience for clients.**

Everything in **Studio**, plus:

*   Custom branding
*   Enhanced client collaboration
*   Share member feedback with clients
*   Private Team commenting
*   Client project board
*   Premium integrations (Jira, Asana, Linear, ClickUp, Monday.com)

##### POPULAR 🔥

![Image 6: red pin icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f348cefc28f73bfbed5b00a/666fdaeb587fa0982ec0a678_pattern-pin-red.svg)

![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f348cefc28f736422d5b00d/66cd58b59c68e38126217fcb_ic-plan-04%20deluxe-outline.svg)

##### Custom

Custom pricing

Custom pricing

**/ mo**

##### Members:

##### Custom

**Designed for enterprises with complex workflows and dedicated support needs.**

Everything in **Premium**, plus:

*   Custom limit on Members
*   Dedicated Success Manager
*   Onboarding & Training Support
*   Secure single sign-on (SSO)

##### POPULAR 🔥

##### INTEGRATIONS

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Do I need to install anything?

Where possible we recommend installing BugHerd via a simple one line JavaScript tag. If you are unable to install any code on your website BugHerd can also be accessed via our browser extension.

Is BugHerd mobile friendly?

The BugHerd sidebar is fully responsive working on mobile websites allowing you to log/close tasks and manage your workflow.

Do you offer annual discounts?

Yes. Select a yearly plan for BugHerd and get two months free.

Can I export my data?

Yes. All BugHerd plans support data export via CSV, XML & JSON. If you're feeling more technical you can also access your tasks via the BugHerd API.

Try BugHerd free for 7 days. No credit card required. Explore flexible pricing plans designed to make managing client feedback on websites ridiculously easy.

##### INTEGRATIONS

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Do I need to install anything?

Where possible we recommend installing BugHerd via a simple one line JavaScript tag. If you are unable to install any code on your website BugHerd can also be accessed via our browser extension.

Is BugHerd mobile friendly?

The BugHerd sidebar is fully responsive working on mobile websites allowing you to log/close tasks and manage your workflow.

Do you offer annual discounts?

Yes. Select a yearly plan for BugHerd and get two months free.

Can I export my data?

Yes. All BugHerd plans support data export via CSV, XML & JSON. If you're feeling more technical you can also access your tasks via the BugHerd API.

Try BugHerd free for 7 days. No credit card required. Explore flexible pricing plans designed to make managing client feedback on websites ridiculously easy.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual plans offer a discount equivalent to two months free.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Ideal for freelancers and small teams.
features: Feedback on websites, Figma designs, PDFs, images

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Perfect for growing agencies needing to manage multiple projects and clients effectively.
Tailored for agencies and larger teams who want to deliver an exceptional project experience for clients.
features: Premium integrations (Jira, Asana, Linear, ClickUp, Monday.com)

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Designed for enterprises with complex workflows and dedicated support needs.
